questionTitle: If it's raining tomorrow, we shall have to ________ the match till Sunday.
Call in and see our ________ of spring fashions today.
We have no ________ in our files of your recent letter to the tax office.
When his aunt died, he ________ a lot of money from her.
Give her a telephone number to ring ________ she gets lost.
His parents never allowed him ________.
Derek is only interested ________ making money.
He was very upset by the ________ of his English examination.
The Government's action caused the rate of inflation to ________ sharply.
They were such good friends. I was surprised when they ________.
I had to leave early ________ I didn't feel very well.
After closing the envelope, the secretary ________ the stamps on firmly.
Don't be so sure ________ yourself!
This diary will prove useful ________ you.
You should not be so sensitive ________ criticism.
I am not familiar ________ his novels and not very keen on reading them.
If you want to attend a course, you should study the college ________ for full particulars of enrolment.
An historical novel is a form of ________ which may include many facts.
The relationship that matters most in the life of a ________ is the one between him and his constituency party.
The mysterious case of the missing millionaire has become the ________ of considerable interest in the press over the last few week.
